content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ home services. I see you might need electrical work done. May I have your name to get started with scheduling an appointment?
Nice to meet you, Julia! Could you please provide your address so I can check our service availability and schedule accordingly?
Thanks, Julia! Our team does serve your area. When would be an ideal time for our electrician to come by?
I’m not sure yet, my spouse needs to approve the appointment first. So I can't give a time now.
reason: Customer needs spouse approval before scheduling, declined to book now.

content: I completely understand, Julia. Please feel free to reach out to us once you have approval from your spouse. We’ll be here to help whenever you’re ready! Have a great day.
reason: Customer needs spouse approval before scheduling, declined to book now.
